title: Mattis wants "all the facts" before addressing Gaza
text:
Mattis wants "all the facts" before addressing Gaza 4:14am IST - 00:25
When asked if Hamas was to blame for Monday's violence in Gaza, Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said didn't want to address that until ''all the facts'' were in. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
